Neko RGBA ColorUtil implementation.

Static Variables

ALPHA_MASK(inline,null) : UInt

BLACK(inline,null) : UInt

BLUE_MASK(inline,null) : UInt

COLOR_MASK(inline,null) : UInt

GREEN_MASK(inline,null) : UInt

INVERTED_ALPHA_MASK(inline,null) : UInt

INVERTED_BLUE_MASK(inline,null) : UInt

INVERTED_COLOR_MASK(inline,null) : UInt

INVERTED_GREEN_MASK(inline,null) : UInt

INVERTED_RED_MASK(inline,null) : UInt

RED_MASK(inline,null) : UInt

WHITE(inline,null) : UInt

Static Methods

inline alpha(v : prime.types.RGBA) : UInt

Returns the alpha value of a RGBA object as a UInt.

inline blend(v : prime.types.RGBA, v2 : prime.types.RGBA) : prime.types.RGBA

Blends to RGBA colors together.

inline blendUInt(v : UInt, v2 : UInt) : UInt

inline blue(v : prime.types.RGBA) : UInt

Returns the blue color from a RGBA value as 0xBB

inline create(?r : UInt, ?g : UInt, ?b : UInt, ?a : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Creates a RGBA object from single color values.

inline darken(v : prime.types.RGBA, grayV : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Darkens the RGBA color by the gray-amount (0-255).

inline float(v : UInt) : Float

Converts two bytes to a Float. Only one color channel should be given as input.

inline gray(v : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Creates a RGBA object containing gray values.

inline green(v : prime.types.RGBA) : UInt

Returns the green color from a RGBA value as 0xGG

inline lighten(v : prime.types.RGBA, grayV : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Lightens the RGBA color by the gray-amount (0-255).

inline random() : prime.types.RGBA

Returns a random color with an alpha value that is always 0xFF

inline red(v : prime.types.RGBA) : UInt

Returns the red color from a RGBA value as 0xRR

inline rgb(v : prime.types.RGBA) : UInt

Returns the RGB properties of a RGBA value as 0xRRGGBB.

inline rgba(v : String) : prime.types.RGBA

Converts a hexadecimal string to a RGBA value

inline rgbaToString(v : prime.types.RGBA) : String

inline setAlpha(v : prime.types.RGBA, a : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Replaces the alpha value of a RGBA object.

inline setBlue(v : prime.types.RGBA, b : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Replaces the blue value of a RGBA object.

inline setGreen(v : prime.types.RGBA, g : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Replaces the green value of a RGBA object.

inline setRed(v : prime.types.RGBA, r : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Replaces the red value of a RGBA object.

inline setRgb(v : prime.types.RGBA, c : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Replaces the RGB properties of a RGBA object.

inline string(v : prime.types.RGBA) : String

Converts a RGBA value to a hexadecimal string.

inline tint(v : prime.types.RGBA, tint : Float) : prime.types.RGBA

Changes the tint of the RGBA color to the given float value (0 - 1).

inline uint(v : Float) : UInt

Converts the given float (0-1) to a uint.

inline uintToString(v : UInt) : String

inline validate(v : prime.types.RGBA) : prime.types.RGBA

Makes sure that the given color is between BLACK and WHITE

inline validate16Bit(v : UInt) : UInt

inline validate8Bit(v : UInt) : UInt
